characters.name: The Cowboy
characters.appearance: Middle-aged man in his 40s with long black hair and a weathered, scarred face. Lean build with a rugged, worn appearance that tells stories of a hard life. Classic Old West cowboy style.
characters.personality: Rugged, strong, confident. Has a rough accent and an unshakeable demeanor. Says 'Carolina strong' with conviction.
characters.role: Protagonist - the hero whose boots save him from a gunshot and allow him to survive and ride off victorious

storyline.overview: A dramatic Old West narrative ad where a middle-aged cowboy standing outside a saloon is shot by the sheriff. The bullet ricochets off his Carolina boots, striking down the sheriff instead. The cowboy survives, declares 'Carolina strong,' and rides off into the sunset - a testament to the durability and toughness of the boots.
storyline.tone: Classic Old West with dark humor and cool, dramatic action beats. Gritty and cinematic with comedic shock value at the ricochet moment.
scenes: Sheriff draws and fires at cowboy
Bullet hits cowboy's boot and ricochets
Bullet strikes down the sheriff in shocking moment
Cowboy looks down at his boots and says 'Carolina strong'
Cowboy rides off into the sunset
